new_pwd_missing: Please send new_password in request body
company_name_missing: Please send a company name in the request body
company_id_missing_params: Please provide a company ID in the request url
company_users_list_missing: Users list is missing from request body. Please send an array of users in the request body wrapped in an object. Example : { 'users_list' : [ {'first_name' : 'Robert'} , 'last_name' : 'Downey Jr' , 'type' : 'hr_admin or employee' , 'email' : 'robert@pushtalents.com' , 'position' : 'Manager' ]}
company_users_incorrect_data: Incorrect user data object. Please send first_name , last_name , position , user_type and email in user object
not_a_valid_enum: {{value}} is not a valid value for {{field}}. Allowed values are : {{allowed_values}}
email_missing: Please send the email in request body
email_not_found: User with email = {{email}} not found. Please make sure the email is correct. Please contact your company administration to register your email if they still haven't yet
email_otp_missing: Please send both email and otp in request body
incorrect_email_otp: Email or OTP is incorrect . Please make sure you enter a valid registered email with correct OTP
otp_expired: OTP expired. Please apply for a new otp and try again
token_missing: Please include token in header as Authentication
user_token_not_found: User not found, please make sure the token is valid. Re-login and try again
super_admin_not_found: Super admin not found , please make sure the token is valid . Re-login and try with the new login auth token
job_missing_data: Incomplete or incorrect data for job sent in request body. Please make sure you send {url , title , location , reward_point , companyId , referral_success_reward_type , referral_success_reward_value} in the request body
employee_not_allowed: Only super admin and company hr_admin have access to this data
job_id_missing_params: Please a job ID in the request url
job_id_missing: Please send job ID in the url
job_share_not_found: No job share with ID = {{id}} was found
missing_candidate_data: Candidate data is missing or incomplete. Please send candidate's first_name , last_name and email in the request body
hr_admin_not_allowed: Company HR are not allowed to make job referrals. Only company employees can refer job via mobile app
job_referral_id_missing: Please send referral ID in request url
company_id_missing: Please send company ID in the request body as companyID
article_data_cannot_be_fetched: Unable to fetch data from the article URL. If you wish to manually add data for this article , then please send a custom=true in the request body along with title , thumb_url , companyId and is_active
article_custom_data_missing: Please send article title and thumb_url in the request body
article_url_missing: Article URL is missing from the request body
article_id_missing: Please send article ID in request body
referral_stage_update_failed: Failed to update job referral stage
hr_admin_no_wallet: Only company employees have wallet. HR Admins do not have wallets
employee_cannot_see_others_wallet: Company employees cannot access others wallet details
user_id_missing: Please send user ID in request url
user_not_found_with_id: No user with ID = {{id}} was found in your company. Please make sure you send the correct user ID
referral_stage_already_at: Nothing to update, job referral stage is already at {{stage}}
reward_data_missing: Reward data is missing. Please send title and points_required in request body
reward_id_missing: Reward ID is missing from the request url
reward_not_from_your_company: This reward does not belong to your company. You can only update rewards that belong to your own company
